name: Amazing Portfolio
author: themebon

sections.description:
Amazing Portfolio is an easy to use responsive and filterable Portfolio-Grid Plugin for WordPress, offering a wide range of customization options.

Live Demo

Features

  • 6 Columns Grid.
  • Image, Gallery, Video portfolio type
  • 100% Responsive
  • Super easy Installation.
  • Unlimited portfolios.
  • Portfolio filter 3 styles.
  • No column space.
  • Portfolio home page gallery.
  • Title on hover.
  • Pagination support.
  • Category support.
  • Related items.
  • Number of post to show.
  • Show item by old or new.
  • Tons of customization options.
  • Powerfull Shortcodes Generator.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
